page.title: 04MAGISTRATES COURT
page.content: MAGISTRATES COURT YOU CAN'T GO TO COURT UNTIL YOU ARE 10/ YOU CAN GO TO WATCH AFTER YOU ARE 14.THE MAGISTRATE IS JUST A NORMAL PERSON TO JUDGE AN ARGUMENT. THERE IS THE DEFENCE AND PROSECUTION. THE MAGISTRATE CAN HAVE UP TO 6 PEOPLE WITH HIM ON THE BENCH. THE CLERK SITS IN FRONT OF THE MAGISTRATE AND KNOWS ALL THE LAW. THE COURT IS IN THE POLICE STATION AND WAS BUILT IN 1887. THE MAGISTRSTES COURT IS ONLY A MINOR COURT. THE MAJOR COURT IS THE CROWN COURT .IT HAS A TRAINED JUDGE. WHEN THE MAGISTRATES COURT IS BEING USED THEY SAY IT IS IN SESSION. THE MAGISTRATES COURT IS ONLY A SMALL ROOM AND IS MUCH SMALLER THAN THE CROWN COURT.
